thread.title: This is what enraged Odell Beckham did to a Packers wall | New York Post
thread.title_full: This is what enraged Odell Beckham did to a Packers wall | New York Post

author: Bart Hubbuch
title: This is what enraged Odell Beckham did to a Packers wall | New York Post
text:
GREEN BAY, Wis. — Odell Beckham Jr. apparently did more damage to Lambeau Field than he did to the Packers secondary Sunday.
Fresh off a miserable, drop-plagued display in the Giants’ 38-13 playoff loss to Green Bay , the combustible wide receiver allegedly punched a hole in the wall just outside the team’s formal interview room.
No one saw Beckham do it, but a Lambeau groundscrew worker heard the wall being punched and immediately came out into the hallway, where only Beckham was standing in front of the hole in the Sheetrock.
According to the worker, Greg Woulf, Beckham responded angrily to Woulf’s co-worker telling him to calm down and replied by saying “F—k off” before walking back into the Giants’ locker room.
ESPN’s Sal Paolantonio reported that Beckham then banged his head against the locker-room door, although that could not be confirmed Sunday night.
Beckham has a history of angry outbursts after losses. He was spotted banging his head against a metal sliding door three times in frustration after a loss to the Eagles at Lincoln Financial Field late last month.
Bart Hubbuch
